script:
Step 1: Find a clear area with ample space to perform the setup.
Step 2: Place the object on a flat surface with the main control panel facing upwards.
Step 3: Locate the power source input at the base of the object and connect the provided cable securely.
Step 4: Press the small button on the side of the control panel to activate the object's display screen.
Step 5: Use the touch interface to input the desired settings and configurations for the object.
Step 6: Once the setup is complete, press and hold the large circular button in the center of the control panel to save the changes.
Step 7: Wait for the initialization sequence to finish, indicated by a series of flashing lights around the object.
Step 8: Stand back as the object starts to hum softly and elevate slightly above the surface.
Step 9: Confirm that the object has stabilized in mid-air before releasing the control panel.
Step 10: Your object is now activated and ready for use.
What should you do after placing the object on a flat surface?
How do you activate the object's display screen?
What should you press and hold after completing the setup configurations?
What is the indication that the initialization sequence is complete?
At what point can you release the control panel during setup?
expected_responses: Connect the power source input securely.
Press the small button on the side of the control panel.
Press and hold the large circular button in the center of the control panel.
A series of flashing lights around the object.
After confirming that the object has stabilized in mid-air.
